stories.title: Remove remaining console.error for expected API failures
acceptanceCriteria: Search all frontend/src/ files for console.error calls
Replace console.error with console.warn for expected API failures (404, 400)
Keep console.error only for truly unexpected errors
Run Cypress console-errors test to verify: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/console-errors.cy.ts --browser chrome
All tests must pass

stories.title: Add loading states to all data-fetching pages
acceptanceCriteria: Check all pages in frontend/src/pages/ for proper loading state (Spin component)
Ensure every page that fetches data shows a loading spinner during fetch
Pages should not flash empty content before data loads
Build must pass: cd frontend && npx tsc --noEmit

stories.title: Add empty state messages for all tables
acceptanceCriteria: Check all Table components across frontend/src/pages/
Ensure locale={{ emptyText: 'Appropriate Vietnamese message' }} is set
Messages should be contextual (e.g., 'Chưa có bệnh nhân', 'Chưa có đơn thuốc')
Build must pass
